description: This file defines React functional components that render Skeleton loading placeholders for various UI elements such as recipe cards, list items, and recipe details in a frontend application. It also includes associated styles for shimmer animations.

methods.name: CardSkeleton
methods.description: Renders a skeleton placeholder for a recipe card, mimicking the structure and layout of the actual content.

methods.name: ListSkeletonItem
methods.description: Provides a skeleton for a list row, representing loading state of list items.

methods.name: DetailSkeleton
methods.description: Displays a skeleton for a detailed recipe page, including image and text placeholders.
